statements: SELECT * FROM patients
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT patient_name, gender, age, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE diagnosis = 'COVID-19' AND admitted = TRUE
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age >= 50
SELECT patient_name, exacerbations_count, complications_count FROM patients ORDER BY exacerbations_count DESC, complications_count ASC
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age >= 50 ORDER BY exacerbations_count DESC, complications_count ASC
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 AND admitted = TRUE ORDER BY patient_name
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female' AND (diagnosis = 'Asthma' OR diagnosis = 'COPD')
SELECT patient_name, age, exacerbations_count FROM patients WHERE age < 40 AND exacerbations_count > 2 ORDER BY age DESC, exacerbations_count
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE diagnosis LIKE 'C%' AND complications_count < 2 ORDER BY patient_name
SELECT * FROM PatientData WHERE age > 40;
SELECT patient_id, gender, disease_status FROM PatientData WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT model_name, result_metric FROM MLModel WHERE last_trained_on >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM PatientData ORDER BY time_of_diagnosis DESC;
SELECT model_id, model_name, last_trained_on FROM MLModel ORDER BY last_trained_on ASC;
SELECT * FROM PatientData WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY gender ASC, time_of_diagnosis DESC;
SELECT patient_id, gender, disease_status FROM PatientData WHERE disease_status='Cancer';
SELECT patient_id, age, time_of_diagnosis FROM PatientData WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM MLModel WHERE result_metric='accuracy' ORDER BY last_trained_on DESC;
SELECT model_id, model_name, result_metric FROM MLModel WHERE result_metric IS NOT NULL ORDER BY model_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis, admission_date FROM Patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate, blood_pressure, temperature FROM PatientData WHERE oxygen_level < 90;
SELECT model_id, model_name, algorithm, accuracy FROM MLModels ORDER BY accuracy DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'M' AND discharge_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM Patients
SELECT patient_id, age, gender, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT p.patient_id, p.diagnosis, pd.heart_rate, pd.blood_pressure FROM Patients p JOIN PatientData pd ON p.patient_id = pd.patient_id WHERE pd.record_date = '2022-01-15'
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis, admission_date, discharge_date FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'M' AND diagnosis LIKE '%COVID%'
SELECT model_name, algorithm, accuracy FROM MLModels WHERE accuracy > 0.8 ORDER BY accuracy DESC
SELECT * FROM patient_data;
SELECT patient_name, age, disease_history FROM patient_data WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_name, exacerbation_probability FROM patient_data JOIN exacerbation_prediction ON patient_data.patient_id = exacerbation_prediction.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, model_name FROM patient_data JOIN machine_learning_model ON patient_data.patient_id = machine_learning_model.model_id;
SELECT model_name, accuracy FROM machine_learning_model WHERE accuracy > 0.8;
SELECT patient_name, age, disease_history FROM patient_data;
SELECT * FROM patient_vitals WHERE heart_rate > 80 AND respiratory_rate < 20;
SELECT model_name, accuracy FROM machine_learning_model ORDER BY accuracy DESC;
SELECT patient_name, exacerbation_probability, prediction_date FROM exacerbation_prediction WHERE exacerbation_probability > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM patient_data JOIN patient_vitals ON patient_data.patient_id = patient_vitals.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, age, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_id, admission_date, discharge_date FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM vitals WHERE heart_rate > 100;
SELECT patient_id, test_name, value FROM lab_results ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC, gender ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM vitals JOIN patients ON vitals.patient_id = patients.patient_id WHERE heart_rate > 100;
SELECT patient_id, test_name, date FROM lab_results WHERE value > 10 AND unit = 'mg/dL' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT prediction_date, predicted_exacerbation, confidence FROM exacerbation_predictions WHERE confidence > 0.8 ORDER BY prediction_date ASC;
